column5: What does a week license cost in Ontario? What about the conservation?
8-Day NR Conservation License $24.00 CDN 8-Day NR Sport License $41.00 CDN
What about a NR annual license?
Annual NR conservation $39.00 CDN Annual NR Sport $64.00 CDN
I'm going to Canada for the first time with my 15 yr. old son and I was wondering what is the differance between conservation and sportsman lic. And with would be the best for us?
A conservation license allows you to keep two fish daily(per species) and bring home two each. A regular 8 day is 4 fish per person. some camps will pay for your conservation.

Isn't the cost of the 8 day licenses up about $3 from the past few years? I realize that you are now getting an extra day, but since most camps are on a 7-day cycle, most people won't get the benefit of the 8th day.
